title: The Ralph Mouse Collection
description: Get ready to zoom through these fast-paced stories full of exciting adventures by Newbery Award-winning author Beverly Cleary. With Ralph S. Mouse behind the handlebars of his favorite toy motorcycle, there's no telling what readers will encounter. This three-book box set includes the entire Ralph S. Mouse The funny, highly illustrated Ralph S. Mouse books will have both eager independent readers and reluctant readers smiling and flipping pages. These classics for boys and girls ages 7-12 stand the test of time.
author: Beverly Cleary
